p: To examine whether specific symptoms are associated with age groups and disease duration, we performed the following analyses: a) Comparison between EOPD ( n = 108) and LOPD ( n = 410, Table 4); b) Comparison by current age groups (see Methods for details, Supplementary Table 4); and c) Comparison by disease duration (<5 years, n = 194; 6–10 years, n = 163;>10 years, n = 159, Supplementary Table 5).
